Text: You are attempting to mislead people with this torrent. The book pictured is not the book you are giving people. In short, this is not the recently released book, but a fan novelization from several years ago that has no license approval or anything to do with the Gareth Roberts book you are showing them.
I honestly didn't know...thanks for telling me. I'll remove it.

I am the uploader. I must have gotten it mixed up with another version. Truly sorry. I uploaded the correct one: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8213458

Sorry for the confusion.
Can't remove it, btw. Some weird thing going on with TPB. Don't download this version.
Thank you very much. It is appreciated.
